attributes.action: All England players from the 1966 World Cup winning team deserve a knighthood
attributes.background: Only Sir Geoff Hurst, Sir Alf Ramsey and Sir Bobby Charlton have knighthoods and all the rest do. Especially the late Bobby Moore.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
